Goal: Single entry point for YAM flows while reusing ERPNext/Agriculture
KPIs/Dashboards (examples): Traceability completeness; Recall time; QC pass rate

Goal: Lot creation, status, lineage, and impacted shipments
Key DocTypes to Link (reuse-first): Lot (+ future Transfer/ScaleTicket), Stock Entry, Batch (if used)
KPIs/Dashboards (examples): Recall time reduction; Lot aging; Stock accuracy

Key DocTypes to Link (reuse-first): QCTest, Certificate, Nonconformance, Quality Inspection (if used)
KPIs/Dashboards (examples): QC pass rate; Nonconformance closure time; Certificate expiry risk

Goal: Evidence packs for audits/customers and expiry monitoring
KPIs/Dashboards (examples): Audit readiness score; Missing evidence count

Goal: Sensor/scale evidence ingestion + quarantine invalid data
KPIs/Dashboards (examples): % valid readings; Quarantine rate; Sensor uptime

Goal: Customer complaints linked to lots and corrective actions
KPIs/Dashboards (examples): Complaint rate; Time to resolution; Repeat incidents
